BBA

(Bachelor of Business Administration)

Under Graduate Degree

Discover more

Eligibility

Pre-University/Higher Secondary/10+2 Examinations or equivalent from any recognized Board or Council in any discipline.

Obtained at least 45% marks (40% in case of candidate belonging to reserved category) in the subjects taken in standard 12 or equivalent

COURSE DURATION

Three Years (Six Semesters)

Know More Here

Overview

The Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) course is a full-time, three-year, undergraduate course of study aimed at preparing young graduates to take up challenging careers in business and industry, and enables them to pursue higher studies thereafter..Creating a global leader is not at all an easy task ,so the relevance of the course is much highlighted as far as the changes in the economy is concerned The course also equips graduates with required skill sets such as analytical, decision-making, technical, interpersonal and technological skills. The course is designed to develop a holistic personality in graduates thus enabling them to succeed as professionals, while at the same time find fulfilment in their personal lives. The overall objective of the course is to prepare young professionals to be responsible and responsive to the demands of society in an ever-changing environment

Aim

Enabling students to acquire contemporary management ideas in association with modern technologies and concepts. strategic development of organizations
Developing the ability of students to apply such concepts to practical situations to obtain accurate result Providing a comprehensive learning experience, analyszing risks ,designed to educate the students about global business practices and market analysis Facilitating learning through complementary networks of students, faculty and industry professionals and involvement of modern technologies. Course Pedagogy Each students are different in their individual learning styles, and each student possesses a unique combination of multiple intelligence and talents. Our integrated teaching methodology which is industry oriented nurtures a stimulating learning environment to encourage students to learn at higher levels. The delivery methodology is student-cantered and includes active learning, inquiry, experiential learning, co-operative and participate learning activities. We focus on integration of knowledge, development of critical thinking, problem solving, and performance skills. Such a learning environment encourages the students to enjoy lessons, try out new things and to think creatively and independently. Our students thrive in a challenging academic atmosphere and enjoy the rich cultural life of the institute.

St.George Collge is affiliated to Bengaluru central university. Our Specalisations are as per university regulations.

International Business Management

Global Marketing Management Intercultural Human Resource Management International Business Finance International Business Law

Human Resource Management

Corporate Leadership and Organization Development Human Resource Development Labour Laws and Welfare Industrial Relation Management International Human Resource Management

MARKETING

Consumer Behavior Sales & Distribution Management Product & Brand Management Integrated Marketing Communications Retail Management

Financial Management

Financial Markets and Services Security Analysis & Portfolio Management Financial Statement Analysis International Financial Management Strategic Financial Management

Operations Management

Project and Service Management Lean Operations and Total Quality Management Innovation and Emerging Trends in Technology Business Analytics & Intelligence Green Energy and Sustainable Operations

Note : An elective specalisation stream is offered in the course only if a minimum number of students enrol for the specilisation.
